categories: Category:Jedi Knights of the Jedi Order

nodes.text: Melik Galerha was a Force-sensitive human male who served as a Jedi Knight of the Jedi Order during the Clone Wars between the Galactic Republic and the Confederacy of Independent Systems. In the year 19 BBY, Galerha attended a briefing given by Jedi Master Obi-Wan Kenobi on the Republic's Outer Rim Sieges in a conference room of the Jedi Temple on the planet Coruscant. Galerha had dark skin, brown eyes and black hair. He wore brown Jedi robes while on Coruscant.

Melik Galerha first appeared in the film Star Wars: Episode III Revenge of the Sith, which was released on May 19, 2005. He was not identified in the film, but received a name in the Star Wars Legends reference book The Complete Star Wars Encyclopedia, which was released on December 9, 2008. The name was then first used in canon in the reference book Star Wars: The Visual Encyclopedia, which was written by Adam Bray, Tricia Barr and Cole Horton and released on April 4, 2017.
